name: Velocity High Speed
description:
Update - 09/02/2022 14:30 : New build with multiple bug fixes

Scenario

While you wake up inside the body of a cat, you learn that a mad scientist changed everyone into ectoplasm made of pure energy in order to create an army of evil robots. You and your friends have to save the world before it's too late.

Gameplay

Velocity High Speed is a fast paced action game mixing platformer, third person shooter and racing. Inspired by as Sonic, Klonoa and Trackmania, this game will make you travel accross levels at full speed and challenge you by combining your platform and shooting skills.

Follow on Twitter for more updates
